review: Well, for the price its a super buy. It does what it says, stream Netflix, YouTube, my music and even mirror my phone on my Sony Bravia.  Why did I get this device since my tv already has a YouTube app and Netflix built in?  Well Google is pulling the plug on the internal building in YouTube app on many smart TVs including the Sony Bravia model that I have.  Im a big you-tuber and enjoy watching YouTube videos on the big screen so for $29.99 its no brainier.  Now its even easier to search for videos and view my playlist since I can do it from my phone and with a push of a button cast it on the screen.  I've also notice the Netflix app on this Chromecast is better than the Sony Bravia's built in one and the picture quality is also an improvement.  All around I would recommend this dongle to turn your TV into a "smart TV" with extra options.  Power from a USB port, HDMI, and a home wireless networking is needed for this devise to work.
